mapper.select: select s.STORE_ID ,s.STORE_NAME ,s.BRAND_ID ,b.BRAND_NAME as brandName ,s.STORE_ADDRESS ,s.WORK_TIME_BEGIN ,s.WORK_TIME_END ,s.STORE_OWNER_NAME ,s.STORE_OWNER_TEL ,s.PRO_INVOICE_FLAG ,s.REMARK ,s.OPERATE_DATE ,s.SETTLEMENT_METHOD ,s.STORE_TEL ,s.REAL_IMAGE_PATH_1 ,s.REAL_IMAGE_PATH_2 ,s.REAL_IMAGE_PATH_3 ,s.AVERAGE_SALES ,s.ELM_SALE ,s.MEITUAN_SALE ,s.BAIDU_SALE ,s.elm_id ,s.ELM_RATE ,s.meituan_id ,s.MEITUAN_RATE ,s.baidu_id ,s.baidu_pwd ,s.BAIDU_RATE ,s.registrant ,s.regist_date ,s.business_license_img ,s.health_license_img ,s.menu_img ,s.corporate_idcard_front ,s.corporate_idcard_back ,s.canteen_img ,s.kitchen_img ,s.door_img ,s.corporate_withidcard_front ,s.corporate_withidcard_back ,s.owner_userId ,s.bound_type ,s.store_type ,s.store_dist_mode from dn_store as s left join dn_brand as b on b.BRAND_ID = s.BRAND_ID where s.STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=CHAR}
